title: Episode #54: The Life Of John L. Sullivan With Christopher Klein
description: In today's episode I talk to author Christopher Klein about his new biography of famed 19th century boxer John L. Sullivan (he's the "boxer man" that serves as the unofficial logo of the Art of Manliness). Klein and I talk about this larger-than-life character and his influence on boxing and modern ideals of manhood in America today.
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
